value.stringValue: Journey associated with {!$Record.Email} has been deleted.

decisions.description: AccountId = 0016e00002asz8xAAA is Orphan Orgs AccountId = 001Qo00000SVKDfIAP is Support Integration Account UserId = 0016e00002asz8xAAA is Account Pool
decisions.name: Enrichment_Check
decisions.label: Enrichment Check

rules.name: Orphan_Orgs_Enrichment_ZoomInfo
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5) OR (2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 6)
rules.label: Orphan Orgs Enrichment (ZoomInfo)

rules.name: Not_Orphan_Orgs_Company_Size_Enrichment
rules.label: Not Orphan Orgs Company Size Enrichment

rules.name: Yes_new_MK_Threshold
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 2) OR (3 AND 4 AND 9) OR (5 AND 6 AND 9)) AND 7 AND 8
rules.label: Yes new MK Threshold

decisions.name: Outbound_Sequencing_without_Journey
decisions.label: Outbound Sequencing without Journey
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Not outbound sequence or has a journey

rules.name: Contact_in_Outbound_Sequence_Without_Journey
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 12 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 11 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16)
rules.label: Contact in Outbound Sequence Without Journey

decisions.description: Current Sequence Name IS NULL Prior Current Sequence Name IS NOT NULL Current Open Journey Stage = 'Accepted' Current Open Journey Outbound Sequence = TRUE
decisions.name: Removed_from_OB_Sequence
decisions.label: Removed from OB Sequence

Flow.description: Adding starts with `[SALES` to the sequence name check that determines the creation of outbound Journeys.

formulas.name: Enriched_Website_Clean
formulas.expression: SUBSTITUTE( IF( FIND("/", IF( FIND("www.", {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) > 0, IF( FIND("//", {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) > 0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, LEFT( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, FIND("//www.", {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) + 5), NULL ), {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c} ), IF( FIND("//", {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) > 0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, LEFT( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, FIND("//", {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) + 1), NULL), {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c} ) ) ) > 0, LEFT( IF( FIND("www.",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c})>0, IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, LEFT( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, FIND("//www.",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) + 5 ), NULL), {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c} ), IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, LEFT( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, FIND("//",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) + 1 ), NULL ), {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c} ) ), FIND("/", IF( FIND("www.",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c})>0, IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, LEFT( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, FIND("//www.", {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) + 5 ), NULL ), {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}), IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) > 0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, LEFT( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, FIND("//",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) + 1 ), NULL ), {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c} ) ) ) -1 ), IF( FIND("www.",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c})>0, IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, LEFT( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, FIND("//www.",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c})+5), NULL ), {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c} ), IF( FIND("//",{!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c})>0, SUBSTITUTE( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, LEFT( {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}, FIND( "//", {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) + 1 ), NULL ), {!$Record.Enriched_Company_Website__c}) ) ), 'www.', '' )

formulas.name: MomentContextChampify
formulas.expression: "A job change was identified for "&{!$Record.FirstName}&" "&{!$Record.LastName}&" (https://retool.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Contact/"&{!$Record.Id}&"/view)"&BR()& "New Account: "&{!$Record.Account.Name}&" ("&"https://retool.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Account/"&{!$Record.AccountId}&"/view)"&BR()& "New Account Owner: "&{!$Record.Account.Account_Owner__c}&BR()& "Past Account: "& {!$Record.ChampifyIo__Past_Account__r.Name}&" (https://retool.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Account/"&{!$Record.ChampifyIo__Past_Account__c}&"/view)"&BR()& "Past Account Owner: "&{!$Record.ChampifyIo__Past_Account__r.Account_Owner__c}&BR()& "Job Started Date: "&TEXT({!$Record.ChampifyIo__Champify_Job_Started_Date__c})&BR()& "LinkedIn URL: "&{!$Record.ChampifyIo__LinkedIn_URL__c}&BR()& "Previous Relationship: "&{!$Record.ChampifyIo__Champify_Persona__c}

Flow.label: Contact - After Save Automations

value.stringValue: Champify: Identified a new job change arrival from {!$Record.ChampifyIo__Past_Account__r.Name}
